divy35:7: buddho bhagavāñ śrāvastyāṁ viharati sma jetavane ’nāthapiṇḍadasyārāme |
divy35:10: sa tayā sārdhaṁ krīḍati tamate paricārayati |
divy35:13: sa kare kapolaṁ dattvā cintāparo vyavasthitaḥ |
divy35:16: sā kathayati—kasmāttvaṁ brāhmaṇa kare kapolaṁ datvā cintāparo vyavasthitah? sa kathayati—mamāpatyaṁ jātaṁ jātaṁ kālaṁ karoti |
divy35:19: sa kathayati—yadā tava patvyāḥ prasavakālaḥ syāt, tadā māṁ śabdāpayethā iti |
divy35:20: athāpareṇa samayena tasya patnyāḥ prasavakāle jātaḥ |
divy35:24: tayā sa dārakaḥ snāpayitvā śuklena veṣṭayitvā navanītenāsyaṁ pūrayitvā dārikāyā haste ’nupradattaḥ |
divy35:26: yaṁ kaṁcit paśyasi brāhmaṇaṁ vā, sa vaktavyah—ayaṁ dārakaḥ pādābhivandanaṁ karotīti |
divy35:27: astaṁ gate āditye yadi jīvati, gṛhītvā āgaccha |
divy35:31: sā dārikā sagauravā sapratīśā pādabhivandanaṁ kṛtvā kathayati—ayaṁ dāraka āryāṇāṁ pādābhivandanaṁ karoti |
divy35:32: te kathayanti—ciraṁ jīva, dīrghamāyuḥ pālayatu, mātāpitrormanorathaṁ pūrayatu |
divy35:33: sthavirasthvirā bhikṣavaḥ pūrvāhṇakālasamaye nivāsya pātracīvaramādāya śrāvastyāṁ piṇḍāya praviśanti |
divy35:34: sā dārikā sagauravā sapratīśā pādābhivandanaṁ kṛtvā kathayati—ayaṁ dāraka āryāṇāṁ pādābhivandanaṁ karotīti |
divy35:35: sthavirāḥ kathayanti—suciraṁ jīvatu, dīrghamāyuḥ pālayatu, mātāpitromanorathaṁ pūrayatu |
divy35:36: bhagavān pūrvāhṇe nivāsya pātracīvaramādāya śrāvastīṁ piṇḍāya praviśati sma |
divy35:37: sā dārikā sagauravā sapratīśā pādābhivandanaṁ kṛtvā kathayati—bhagavān, ayaṁ dārako bhagavataḥ pādābhivandanaṁ karotīti |
divy35:38: bhagavānāha—ciraṁ jīvatu, dīrghamāyuḥ pālayatu, mātāpitromanorathaṁ pūrayatu |
divy35:41: sā taiḥ pṛṣṭā—jīvati dārakah? sā kathayati—jīvati |
divy35:43: te kathayanti—kiṁ bhavatu dārakasya nāma? ayaṁ dārako mahāpathe dhāritaḥ |
divy35:45: mahāpanthako dāraka unnīto vardhito mahān saṁvṛttaḥ |
divy35:46: sa yadā mahān saṁvṛttastadā lipyāmupanyastaḥ, saṁkhyāyāṁ gaṇanāyāṁ mudrāyāṁ brāhmaṇikāyāmīryāyāṁ śauce samudācāre bhasmagrahe autkare bhoskāre ṛgvede yajurvede sāmavede ’tharvavede yajane yājane ’dhyayane ’dhyāpane dāne pratigrahe |
divy35:49: tasya bhūyaḥ krīḍato ramataḥ paricārayataḥ patnī āpannasattvā saṁvṛttā |
divy35:54: tayā sa dārakaḥ snāpayitvā śuklena vastreṇa veṣṭayitvā navanītenāsyaṁ pūrayitvā dārikāyā haste dattaḥ |
divy35:55: sā dārikoktā—imaṁ tvaṁ dārakaṁ caturmahāpathe dhāraya |
divy35:56: yadi kaṁcitpaśyasi śramaṇaṁ brāhmaṇaṁ vā, sa vaktavyah—ayaṁ dāraka āryasya pādābhivandanaṁ karoti |
divy35:57: astaṁ gata āditye yadi jīvati, gṛhītvā āgaccha |
divy35:59: sā dārikā alasajātīyā taṁ dārakamādāya panthalikāyāṁ sthitā |
divy35:61: sā dārikā sagauravā sapratīśā pādabhivandanaṁ kṛtvā kathayati—ārya, ayaṁ daraka āryāṇāṁ pādābhivandanaṁ karoti |
divy35:62: te kathayanti—ciraṁ jīvatu, dīrghamāyuḥ pālayatu, mātāpitromanorathaṁ pūrayatu |
divy35:65: sā taiḥ pṛṣṭā—jīvati dārakah? sā kathayati—jīvatīti |
divy35:66: te kathayanti—kutra tvayaiṣa dhāritah? sā kathayati—amuṣyāṁ panthalikāyām |
divy35:67: te kathayanti—kiṁ bhavatu dārakasya nāma? ayaṁ dārakaḥ panthalikāyāṁ dhāritaḥ |
divy35:69: panthako dāraka unnīto vardhito mahān saṁvṛttiḥ |
divy35:72: atha tasyācāryaḥ kathayati—brāhmaṇa, mayā prabhūtadārakāḥ pāṭhayitavyāḥ |
divy35:74: mahāpanthakasyālpamucyate prabhūtaṁ gṛhṇāti, asya tu panthakasya sītyukte dhamiti vismarati |
divy35:75: brāhmaṇaḥ saṁlakṣayati—sarve brāhmaṇā lipyakṣarakuśalā bhavanti, vedabrāhmaṇa eṣa bhaviṣyati |
divy35:77: tasya omityukte bhūriti vismarati, bhūrityukta omiti vismarati |
divy35:80: asya omityukte bhūriti vismarati, bhūrityukta omiti vismarati |
divy35:81: brāhmaṇaḥ saṁlakṣayati—na sarve brāhmaṇā vedapāragā bhavanti |
divy35:83: sa yatra kvacinnimantritako gacchati, tameva panthakamādāya gacchati |
divy35:84: atha tena samayena sa brāhmaṇo glānībhūtaḥ |
divy35:86: sa tena mahāpanthaka uktah—putra, tvaṁ mamātyayādaśocyo ’si |
divy35:87: api tu tvayā panthakasya yogodvahanaṁ kartavyamiti |
divy35:88: ityuktvā— sarve kṣayāntā nicayāḥ patanāntāḥ samucchrayāḥ |
divy35:91: te taṁ nīlapītalohitāvadātairvastraiḥ śibikāmalaṁkṛtya mahatā satkāreṇa śmaśāne dhmāpayitvā śokavinodaṁ kṛtvā avasthitāḥ |
divy35:93: āyuṣmantau śāriputramaudgalyāyanau pañcaśataparivārau kosaleṣu jānapadeṣu cārikāṁ carantau śrāvastīmanuprāptau |
divy35:94: śrāvastyāṁ janakāyena śrutam—āyuṣmantau śāriputramaudgalyāyanau pañcaśataparivārau kosaleṣu jānapadeṣu cārikāṁ carantau śrāvastīmanuprāptau |
divy35:95: śrutvā ca punaḥ sa janakāyo bahir nirgantumārabdhaḥ |
divy35:96: mahāpanthako ’pi bahiḥ śrāvastyāmanyatamasmin vṛkṣamūle pañcamātrāṇi māṇavakaśatāni brāhmaṇakān mantrān vācayati |
divy35:97: tena sa janakāyaḥ śrāvastyā nirgacchan dṛṣṭaḥ |
divy35:98: sa tān māṇavakān pṛcchati—bhavantaḥ, ka eṣa mahājanakāyo nirgacchati? te tasya kathayanti—upādhyāya, bhadantau śāriputramaudgalyāyanau pañcaśataparivārau kosaleṣu janapadeṣu cārikāṁ caritvā iha śrāvastīmanuprāptau, taddarśanāyopasaṁkrāntaḥ |
divy35:99: kiṁ nu tau draṣṭavyau? yatredānīṁ tadagraṁ varṇamapahāya dvitīyavarṇasya śramaṇasya gautamasyāntike pravrajitau |
divy35:103: yadyupādhyāyasteṣāṁ dharmaṁ śṛṇuyāt, sthānametadvidyate yadupādhyāyasyāpi rocate |
divy35:104: ācaritaṁ teṣāṁ māṇavakānām yadā apāṭhā bhavanti, te kadācinnagarāvalokanayā gacchanti |
divy35:107: apareṇa samayena te sarve apāṭhāḥ saṁvṛttāḥ |
divy35:112: tena tasya daśa kuśalāḥ karmapathā vistareṇa saṁprakāśitāḥ |
divy35:118: tena tasya dvādaśāṅgaḥ pratītyasamutpādo ’nulomapratilomo vistareṇa prakāśitaḥ |
divy35:119: so ’bhiprasannaḥ kathayati—bho bhikṣu, labheyāhaṁ svākhyāte dharmavinaye pravrajyāmupasampadaṁ bhikṣubhāvam |
divy35:126: sa tena janapadaṁ nītvā pravrajitah upasampāditaḥ, uktaśca |
divy35:129: tena divā uddiśatā yoniśo bhāvayatā trīṇi piṭakāni, rātrau cintayatā tulayatā upaparīkṣamāṇena sarvakleśaprahāṇādarhatvaṁ sākṣātkṛtam |
divy35:130: arhan saṁvṛttastraidhatukavītarāgaḥ samaloṣṭakāñcana ākāśapāṇitalasamacitto vāsīcandanakalpo vidyāvidāritāṇḍakośo vidyābhijñāpratisaṁvitprāpto bhavalābhalobhasatkāraparāḍbhukhaḥ |
divy35:133: yadā panthakasya bhogāstanutvaṁ parikṣayaṁ paryādānaṁ gatāḥ, sa kṛcchreṇa jīvikāṁ kalpayitumārabdhaḥ |
divy35:136: athāyuṣmān mahāpanthakaḥ pañcaśataparivāro yena śrāvastī tena cārikāṁ prakrāntaḥ |
divy35:138: śrāvastyāṁ janakāyena śrutam—āryo mahāpanthakaḥ pañcaśataparivāraḥ kosaleṣu janapadeṣu cārikāṁ carañ śrāvastīmanuprāptaḥ |
divy35:141: sa pṛcchati—bhavantaḥ, kutreṣu mahājanakāyo gacchati? te kathayanti—āryo mahāpanthakaḥ pañcaśataparivātaḥ kosaleṣu janapadeṣu cārikāṁ carañ śrāvastīmanuprāptaḥ |
divy35:143: panthakaḥ saṁlakṣayati—eṣāmasau na bhrātā na jñātiḥ |
divy35:145: ahaṁ kasmāttaṁ na darśanāyopasaṁkrāmāmi? so ’pi taddarśanāyopasaṁkrāntaḥ |
divy35:146: sa tena dṛṣṭaḥ pṛṣṭaśca—panthaka, katham yāpayasi? kṛcchreṇa yāpayāmi? kiṁ na pravrajasi? sa kathayati—ahaṁ cūḍaḥ paramacūḍo dhanvaḥ paramadhanvaḥ |
divy35:147: ko māṁ pravrājayiṣyatīti? āyuṣmān mahāpanthakaḥ saṁlakṣayati—santyasya kānicitkuśalamūlāni? santi |
divy35:148: kenāyaṁ na yogyah? āgaccha, ahaṁ tvāṁ pravrājayiṣyāmi |
divy35:150: tena tasyoddeśo dattah— pāpaṁ na kuryānmanasā na vācā kāyena vā kiṁcana sarvaloke |
divy35:151: riktaḥ kāmaiḥ smṛtimān saṁprajānan duḥkhaṁ na sa vidyādanarthopasaṁhitam (1)|
divy35:152: tasyaiṣā gāthā traimāsyenāpi na vṛttā jātā |
divy35:153: anyeṣāṁ gopālakānāṁ paśupālakānāṁ śrutvā pravṛttā jātā |
divy35:156: dharmatā khalu yathā buddhānāṁ bhagavatāṁ dvau śrāvakāṇāṁ saṁnipātau bhavataḥ, āṣāḍhyāṁ varṣopanāyikāyāṁ kārtikapūrṇamāsyām |
divy35:158: tatra ye āṣāḍhīvarṣopanāyikāyāmupasaṁkrāmanti, te tāṁstān manasikāraviśeṣānādāya tāsu tāsu grāmanigamarāṣṭrarājadhānīṣu varṣā upagacchanti |
divy35:159: ye kārtikyāṁ ca pūrṇamāsyāmupasaṁkramanti, te svādhyāyanikāṁ paripṛcchanikāṁ ca yācanti, yathādhigataṁ cārocayanti |
divy35:160: āyuṣmato mahāpanthakasya sārdhaṁvihāryantevāsikā bhikṣavo janapade varṣoṣitāḥ, te ’pyeva kārtikyāṁ pūrṇamāsyām yenāyuṣmān mahāpanthakastenopasaṁkrāntāḥ |
divy35:162: tatra ye cūḍā bhavanti paramacūḍā dhanvāḥ paramadhanvāḥ, te ṣaḍvargīyān sevante bhajante paryupāsante |
divy35:163: āyuṣmān panthakaḥ ṣaḍvargīyān sevate bhajate paryupāsate |
divy35:164: sa ṣaḍvargīyairucyate—āyuṣman panthaka, tava samānopādhyāyā upādhyāyasyāntikātsvadhyāyinikāṁ paripṛcchinikām yācanti |
divy35:166: sa kathayati—mayā na kiṁcitpaṭhitaṁ traimāsye, na tvekā gāthā mama vṛttā jātā, kimahaṁ svādhyāyinikām yāceyamiti? te kathayanti—nanūktaṁ bhagavatā—asvādhyāyamānā mattā iti |
divy35:167: kiṁ tavāsvādhyāyamānasya gāthā anupravṛttā bhaviṣyati? gaccha, yācāhi |
divy35:168: sa gatvā kathayati—upādhyāya, svādhyāyinikāṁ tāvanme dehi |
divy35:169: āyuṣmān mahāpanthakaḥ saṁlakṣayati—kimasyedaṁ svaṁ pratibhānamāhosvit kenacitprayuktah? sa paśyati—yāvatprayuktaḥ |
divy35:170: āyuṣmān mahāpanthakaḥ saṁlakṣayati—kiṁ nvayamutsahanāvineya āhosvidavasāadanāvineyah? sa paśyati—yāvadavasādanāvineyaḥ |
divy35:171: sa tena grīvāayāṁ gṛhītvā bahirvihārasya niṣkāsitaḥ |
divy35:173: kiṁ tvamasmiñ śāsane kariṣyasi? sa roditumārabdhaḥ |
divy35:176: dṛṣṭvā ca punarāgacchantamidamavocat—kasmāttvaṁ pathaka vahirvihārasya rodiṣyasi, aśrūṇi vartayasi? ahamasmi bhadanta upādhyāyena niṣkāsitaḥ |
divy35:178: bhagavānāha—nedaṁ vatsa maunīndraṁ vacanaṁ tavopādhyāyena tribhiḥ kalpāsaṁkhyeyairaneikairduṣkaraśatasahasraiḥ ṣaṭ pāramitāḥ paripūrya samudānītam, api tu mayedaṁ maunīndraṁ pravacanaṁ tribhiḥ kalpāsaṁkhyeyairanaikairduṣkaraśatasahasraiḥ ṣaṭ pāramitāḥ paripūrya samudānītam |
divy35:179: na śakyasi tvaṁ tathāgatasyāntikātpaṭhitum? ahamasmi bhadanta cūḍaḥ paramacūḍo dhanvaḥ paramadhanvaḥ |
divy35:180: atha bhagavānasyāmutpattau gāthāṁ bhāṣate— yo bālo bālabhāvena paṇḍitastatra tena saḥ |
divy35:181: bālaḥ paṇḍitamānī tu sa vai bāla ihocyate (2)|
divy35:182: asthānamanavakāśo yadbuddhā bhagavantaḥ padaśo dharmaṁ vācayiṣyanti nedaṁ sthānaṁ vidyate |
divy35:183: tatra bhagavānāyuṣmantamānandamāmantrayate sma—imaṁ pāṭhaya tvamānanda panthakam |
divy35:186: āyuṣmānānando bhagavantamidamavocat—mayā tāvadbhadanta śāsturupasthānaṁ karaṇīyam, śrutamudgrahītavyam, gaṇo vācayitavyaḥ |
divy35:189: bhagavatā tasya dve pade datte—rajo harāmi, malaṁ harāmīti |
divy35:203: athāyuṣmataḥ panthakasya rātryāḥ pratyūṣasamaye etadabhavat—bhagavānevamāha—rajo harāmi, malaṁ harāmīti |
divy35:204: kiṁ nu bhagavānādhyātmikaṁ rajaḥ saṁdhāyāha āhosvidbāhyam? tasyaivaṁ cintayatastasyāṁ velāyāmaṣrutapūrvāstisro gāthā āmukhīpravṛttā jātāh— rajo ’tra rāgo na hi reṇureṣa rajo rāgasyādhivacanaṁ na reṇoḥ |
divy35:205: etadrajaḥ prativinudanti paṇḍitā na ye pramattāḥ sugatasya śāsane (3)|
divy35:206: rajo ’tra dveṣo na hi reṇureṣa rajo dveṣasyādhivacanaṁ na reṇoḥ |
divy35:207: etadrajaḥ prativinudanti paṇḍitā na ye pramattāḥ sugatasya śāsane (4)|
divy35:208: rajo ’tra moho na hi reṇureṣa rajo mohasyādhivacanaṁ na reṇoḥ |
divy35:209: etadrajaḥ prativinudanti paṇḍitā na ye pramattāaḥ sugatasya śāsane (5)|
divy35:211: arhan saṁvṛttas traidhātukavītarāgaḥ samaloṣṭakāñcana ākāśapāṇitalasamacitto vāsīcandanakalpo vidyāvidāritāṇḍakośo vidyābhijñāpratisaṁvitprāpto bhavalābhalobhasatkāraparānmukhaḥ |
divy35:215: sa tena bāhau gṛhītvoktah—āgaccha svādhyāyinikāṁ tāvatkuru, tataḥ paścāddhyāyiṣyasīti |
divy35:216: athāyuṣmatā panthakena sarvakleśaprahāṇādarhattvaṁ sākṣātkṛtam, gajabhujasadṛśo bāhurutsṛṣṭaḥ |
divy35:217: āyuṣmatā mahāpanthakena pṛṣṭato mukhaṁ vyavalokayatā dṛṣṭaḥ |
divy35:218: sa kathayati—āyuṣman panthaka, evaṁ te tvayā guṇagaṇā adhigatāh? adhigatāḥ |
divy35:220: yadā āyuṣmatā panthakena sarvakleśaprahāṇādarhattvaṁ sākṣātkṛtam, anyatīrthikā avadhyāyanti dhriyanti vivācayanti |
divy35:221: śramaṇo gautama evamāha—gambhīro me dharmo gambhīrāvabhāso durdṛśo durnubodho ’tarko ’tarkāvacaraḥ, sūkṣumo nipuṇapaṇḍitavijñavedanīyaḥ |
divy35:222: atredānīṁ kiṁ gambhīro ’sya, yasyedānīṁ panthakaprabhṛtayaścūḍāḥ paramacūḍā dhanvāḥ paramadhanvāḥ pravrajanti |
divy35:223: bhagavān saṁlakṣayati—sumeruprakhye mahāśrāvake mahājanakāyaḥ kṣāntiṁ gṛhṇāti |
divy35:225: tatra bhagavānāyuṣmantamānandamāmantrayate—gaccha ānanda, panthakasya kathaya—bhikṣuṇyaste avavaditavyā iti |
divy35:226: evaṁ bhadantetyāyuṣmānānando bhagavataḥ pratiśrutya yenāyuṣmān panthakastenopasaṁkrāntaḥ |
divy35:227: upasaṁkramyāyuṣmantaṁ panthakamidamavocat—śāstā tvāmāyuṣman panthaka evamāha—bhikṣuṇyaste avavaditavyā iti |
divy35:228: āyuṣmān panthakaḥ kathayati—kimarthaṁ sthavirasthavirān bhikṣūnapahāya māṁ bhagavān bhikṣuṇyavavādakamājñāpayati? mamaiva guṇodbhāvanā kartavyeti śāsturmanorathaṁ paripūrayiṣyāmīti |
divy35:230: tā bhikṣūn pṛcchanti—bhagavatā ko ’smākamavavādaka ājñaptah? te kathayanti—āyuṣmān panthakaḥ |
divy35:231: tāḥ kathayanti—bhaginyaḥ, paśyata kathaṁ mātṛgrāmaḥ paribhūtaḥ |
divy35:232: yena tribhirmāsairekā gāthā paṭhitā, sāpi na pravṛttā |
divy35:235: tāḥ parṣadamāgatā bhikṣuṇībhiḥ pṛṣṭāh—bhaginyaḥ, ko ’smākamavavaditumāgamiṣyati? tāḥ kathayanti—āryapanthakaḥ |
divy35:236: kimāryo mahāpanthakah? na hyayam, sa tvanyaścūḍāpanthakaḥ |
divy35:239: bhaginyaḥ paśyata, kathaṁ mātṛgrāmaḥ paribhūtah? yena tribhirmāsairekā gāthā paṭhitā, sāpi na pravṛttā |
divy35:240: imā bhikṣuṇyastripiṭā dharmakathikā yuktamuktapratibhānāḥ, sa kila kimāsāmavavadiṣyatīti? tāḥ kathayanti—bhaginyaḥ, ṣaḍjanyo dvādaśahastikābhirlatābhiḥ siṁhāsanaṁ prajñapayantu |
divy35:241: ṣaḍjanyaḥ śrāvastyāṁ praviśya rathya rathyāvīthicatvaraśṛṅgāṭakeṣvārocayantu—so ’smākaṁ tādṛśo ’vavādaka āgamiṣyati, yo ’smākaṁ tanusatyāni na drakṣyati |
divy35:243: yena na kaścit putramoṭikāputro ’lpaśruta utsahate bhikṣuṇīravavaditum |
divy35:244: tāsāṁ ṣaḍbhir janībhir dvādaśahastikābhir latābhiḥ saṁhāsanaṁ prajñaptam, ṣaḍbhikṣuṇībhiḥ śrāvastīṁ praviśya rathyāvīthicatvaraśṛṅgāṭakeṣvārocitam—so ’smākaṁ tādṛśo ’vavādaka āgamiṣyati, yo ’smākaṁ tanusatyāni na drakṣyati |
divy35:246: āyuṣmān panthakaḥ pūrvāhṇe nivāsya pātracīvaramādāya śrāvastīṁ piṇḍāya prāvikṣat |
divy35:247: kṛtabhaktakṛtyaḥ paścādbhaktāpiṇḍapātrapratikrāntaḥ pātracīvaraṁ pratisamayya pādau prakṣālya vihāraṁ praviṣṭaḥ pratisamlayanāya |
divy35:248: athāyuṣmān panthakaḥ sāyāhne pratisamlayanāya vyutthāya saṁghāṭīmādāya anyatamena bhikṣuṇā paścāccramaṇena saṁprasthitaḥ |
divy35:249: anekāni prāṇiśatasahasrāṇi—kāni ca kutūhalajātāni, kānicit pūrvakaiḥ kuśalamūlaiḥ saṁcodyamānāni |
divy35:250: adrākṣīt sā pariṣat āyuṣmantaṁ panthakaṁ dūrādeva |
divy35:251: dṛṣṭvā ca punaḥ parasparaṁ pṛcchati—kataro ’tra bhikṣuṇyavavādakah? kiṁ puraḥśramaṇaḥ, āhosvit paścācchramaṇah? tatraike kathayanti—puraḥśramaṇaḥ |
divy35:253: yena tribhirmāsairekā gāthā paṭhitā, sāpi na pravṛttā, sa kiṁ bhikṣuṇīravavadiṣyati, dharmaṁ vā vācayiṣyati? gacchāmaḥ |
divy35:254: apare kathayanti—tiṣṭhāmo yadi dharmaṁ deśayiṣyati, śroṣyāmaḥ |
divy35:257: āyuṣmatā panthakena siṁhāsanaṁ dṛṣṭaṁ prajñaptakaṁ dṛṣṭvā saṁlakṣayati—kiṁ tāvat prasādajātābhiḥ prajñaptamāhosvit viheṭhanābhiprāyābhih? paśyati—yāvat viheṭhanābhiprayābhiḥ |
divy35:258: dṛṣṭvā saṁlakṣayati—kiṁ tāvat prasādajātābhiḥ prajñaptamāhosvit viheṭhanābhiprasāyābhih? paśyati—yāvat viheṭhanābhiprāyābhiḥ |
divy35:259: āyuṣmatā panthakena gajabhujasadṛśaṁ bāhumabhiprasārya taṁ siṁhāsanam yathāsthāne sthāpitam |
divy35:261: sa niṣīdan kaiścit dṛṣṭah. kaiścit na dṛṣṭaḥ |
divy35:262: athātrastha āyuṣmān panthakastadrūpaṁ samādhiṁ samāpanno yathā samāhite citte sve āsane ’ntarhitaḥ, pūrvasyāṁ diśi uparivihāyasamabhyudgamya pūrvavat yāvat ṛddhiprātihāryāṇi vidarśya tān ṛddhyabhisaṁskārān pratiprasrabhya prajñapta evāsane niṣaṇṇaḥ |
divy35:263: niṣadya āyuṣmān panthakastā bhikṣuṇīrāmantrayate—mayā bhaginyastribhirmāsairekā gāthā paṭhitā |
divy35:264: utsahetavyāni(?) śrotumekagāthāyāḥ saptarātriṁdivasānyanyaiḥ padairvyañjanairarthaṁ vibhaktum? pāpaṁ na kuryānmanasā na vācā kāyena vā kiṁcana sarvaloke |
divy35:265: riktaḥ kāmeiḥ smṛtimān saṁprajānan duḥkhaṁ na sa vidyādanarthopasaṁhitam (6)|
divy35:267: sarvapāpasya bhagavān kāraṇamāha—yāvadgāthārthasyārthamadhītam yāti, tāvad dvādaśabhiḥ prāṇisahasraiḥ satyāni dṛṣṭāni |
divy35:268: kaiścicchrotāpattiphalaṁ sākṣātkṛtam, kaiścit sakṛdāgāmiphalam, kaiścidanāgāmiphalam, kaiścit pravrajya sarvakleśaprahāṇādarhattvaṁ sākṣātkṛtam, kaiścicchrāvakabodhau cittānyutpāditāni, kaiścit pratyekāyāṁ bodhau, kaiścidanuttarāyāṁ samyaksambodhau cittānyutpāditāni |
divy35:269: yadbhūyasā sā pariṣad buddhaniṁnādharmapravaṇā saṁghaprāgbhārā vyavasthitā |
divy35:270: athāyuṣmān panthakastāṁ pariṣadaṁ dharmyayā kathayā saṁdarśya samādāpya samuttejya saṁpraharṣyotthāyāsanāt prakrāntaḥ |
divy35:272: te saṁlakṣayanti—adyāyuṣmatā panthakena mahājanakāyaḥ prasādito bhaviṣyati |
divy35:273: te na ṣaknuvantyāyuṣmantaṁ panthakaṁ saṁmukhamapriyaṁ praṣṭum |
divy35:275: āyuṣman, adya āyuṣmatā panthakena kiṁ mahājanakāyo na prasādito vā prasāditah? āyuṣmatā na kaścit aprasāditaḥ |
divy35:276: bhagavatā vārāṇasyām ṛṣivadane mṛgadāve triparivartaṁ dvādaśākāraṁ dharmyaṁ cakraṁ pravartitam, tadadyāyuṣmatā panthakenānupravartitam |
divy35:277: yāvadgāthārthaṁ na vibhajati, tāvad dvādaśabhiḥ praṇisahasraiḥ satyāni dṛṣṭāni |
divy35:279: tatra bhagavāan bhikṣūnāmantrayate sma—eṣo ’gro me bhikṣavo bhikcūṇāṁ mama śrāvakāṇāṁ cetovivartakuśalānām yaduta panthako bhikṣuḥ |
divy35:280: bhikṣavo buddhaṁ bhagavantaṁ pṛcchanti—paśya bhadanta dvādaśavargīyābhirāyuṣmataḥ panthakasyānarthaṁ kariṣyāmi ityatha eva kṛtaḥ |
divy35:281: bhagavānāha—na bhikṣava etarhi yathā atīte ’pyadhvani ābhiranarthaṁ kariṣyāma ityartha eva kṛtaḥ |
divy35:286: sa tayā sardhaṁ krīḍati ramate paricārayati |
divy35:287: tasya krīḍato ramamāṇasya paricārayato bhūyaḥ krīḍati ramate paricārayati yāvar dvādaśa putrā jātāḥ |
divy35:292: yadā tāsāṁ svāmino bahir nirgatā bhavanti, tadā tāḥ parapuruṣaiḥ sārdhaṁ paricārayanti |
divy35:294: sa jānāti—ayaṁ mama putrasya śabdaḥ, ayaṁ parapuruṣayeti |
divy35:295: sa puruṣāṇāṁ padaśabdāñ śrutvā tāḥ snuṣā garjayati. tāḥ saṁlakṣayanti—ayaṁ brāhmaṇp^smākamanarthāya pratipannaḥ |
divy35:297: taistā uktāh—kiṁ kāraṇam yūyaṁ tātasya cakaṭyodanaṁ kāñjikacchiṭiṁ cānuprayacchata? tāḥ kathayanti—tasya puṇyāni parikṣīṇāni, asyārthe piparīkāyāṁ ta:ḍulāḥ prakṣiptā bhavanti, cakaṭyodanaṁ parivartate, dadhi prakṣiptaṁ kāñjikaṁ parivartate |
divy35:298: te kathayanti—kimetadevaṁ bhaviṣyati? tāḥ kathayanti—vayam yuṣmākaṁ pratyakṣīkariṣyāmaḥ |
divy35:300: tābhiḥ kumbhakāara uktah—śakṣyasi tvaṁ bhadramukham ekamukhike dve sthālyau kartum? sa kathayati—śakṣyāmi |
divy35:302: tābhirekasyāṁ sthālyāṁ cakaṭitaṇḍulāḥ prakṣiptāḥ, dvitīyāyāṁ kāñjikam |
divy35:303: tābhiḥ svāmināṁ purastādekasya sthālyāṁ taṇḍulāḥ prakṣiptā ekasyāṁ dadhi |
divy35:307: tābhisteṣāṁ purastāttasyaukasyāḥ sthālyā uddhṛtya cakaṭyodanaṁ dattaṁ dvitīyāyāḥ kañjikam |
divy35:308: tata evaṁ tābhisteṣāmekasyāḥ sthālyā uddhṛtya śālyodanaṁ dattaṁ dvitīyāyā dadhi uddhṛtam |
divy35:309: te tasya kathayanti—tāta, tava puṇyāni parikṣīṇāni |
divy35:310: yata ekasyāṁ sthālyāṁ śālitaṇḍulāḥ prakṣiptāḥ, dvitīyasyāṁ dadhi, taccakaṭyodanaṁ kāñjikaṁ ca parivṛttam |
divy35:312: kiṁ kāraṇaṁ mama puṇyāni parikṣīṇāni? tena tāsāmapratyakṣaṁ mahānasaṁ praviśya paryeṣamāṇena hastasaṁspatśenaikamukhe dve sthālyau labdhe |
divy35:314: tena etṣāṁ putrāṇāmāgatānāṁ te pradarśite—paśyata, mama puṇyāni parikṣīṇāni |
divy35:315: gatvā paśyadhvamasmākaṁ gṛha eva ekamukhī sthālī |
divy35:316: putraka, anyeṣu geheṣu na shālīdvayaṁ tvakamukhamasmākaṁ mandabhāgyānām |
divy35:322: tāḥ pṛcchanti—asti sarpa iti? sa kathayati—kīdṛśaṁ sarpaṁ mṛgayatha jīvantamāhosvit mṛtakamiti? tāḥ kathayanti—mṛtakam |
divy35:323: sa saṁlakṣayati—kemetā mṛtakena sarpeṇa kariṣyanti? nūnametā etaṁ vṛddhaṁ mārayitukāmā bhaviṣyanti |
divy35:324: dharmatā khalu sarpasya ruṣitasya dvayoḥ sthānayorviṣaṁ saṁkrāmati—śirasi pucche ca |
divy35:325: tena roṣitvā śiraḥ pucchaṁ svayaṁ chittvā tāsāṁ madhye sarpā dattaḥ |
divy35:326: tābhirjomāṁ sādhayitvā sa brāhmaṇa uktah—tāta, hilimāṁ joma pāsyasi? sa brāhmaṇaḥ saṁlakṣayati—kimetā me hilimāṁ jomāṁ dāsyanti? nūnaṁ kiṁcit abhaiṣajyaṁ dattaṁ bhaviṣyati |
divy35:327: sa saṁlakṣayati—pibāmi, yathā ca tathā marāmi |
divy35:335: tāḥ kathayanti—tāta, bhūyaḥ pāsyasi? sa kathayati—pāsyāmīti |
divy35:338: tasya tena bāṣpeṇa bhūyasyā mātrayā paṭale sphuṭite |
divy35:340: tāḥ pūrvam yathā tasyāndhasya tato viśvastā vihṛtavantyastathaiva vihartumārabdhāḥ |
divy35:342: kathayati ca—kim yūyaṁ jānītha idānīmapyahaṁ na paśyāmi? paśyāmyahamidānīmiti |
divy35:346: yo ’sau brāhmaṇaḥ, eṣa evāsau panthakastena kālena tena samayena |
divy35:347: yāstāstasya dvādaśa snuṣāḥ, etā eva tā dvādaśavargīyāḥ |
divy35:349: etarhyapi ābhirasyānarthaṁ kariṣyāma ityartham eva kṛtaḥ |
divy35:351: bhikṣavo buddhaṁ bhagavantaṁ pṛcchanti—paśya bhadanta bhagavatā āyuṣmān panthakaḥ parīttenāvavādenācodya saṁsārakāntārāduttārya atyantaniṣṭhe anuttare yogakṣeme nirvāṇe pratiṣṭāpitaḥ |
divy35:352: bhagavānāha—na bhikṣava etarhi yathā atīte ’pyadhvanyeṣo mayā parīttenāvavādenācodya mahatyaiśvaryādhipatye pratiṣṭhāpitāḥ |
divy35:355: bhūtabhūtaṁ bhikṣavo ’nyatamasmin kartavaṭake gṛhapariḥ prativasati āḍyo sahādhano mahābhogaḥ |
divy35:357: sa tayā sārdhaṁ trīṭati ramate paticārayati |
divy35:362: sa gṛhapatiḥ saṁlakṣayati—yadahamasyai prabhūtānaṁ kārṣāpaṇān dāsyāmi, parapuruṣaiḥ sārdhaṁ vihariṣyati |
divy35:364: tasmin karpaṭake śreṣṭhī prativasati tasya gṛhapatervayasyaḥ |
divy35:365: tasya haste prabhūtāḥ kārṣāpaṇāḥ sthāpitāh—yadi mama patnyā bhaktācchādena yogodvahanaṁ kuryāḥ |
divy35:367: tarraivānayena vyasanamāpannah. tayā sa dārako jñātibakena svahastabalena vā āyāpitā(payitvā) pālito vardhitaḥ |
divy35:368: sa mātaraṁ pṛcchati—amba, kimasmākaṁ pitā pitāmahāśca karmākārṣuh? sā saṁlakṣayati—yadyasya vakṣyāmi mahāsamudre potasaṁvyavahāriṇa āsann iti, sthānametadvidyate yadeṣo ’pi mahāsamudramavatariṣyatīti, tatraiva anayena vyasanamāpatsyate |
divy35:369: śrutamāhitastava putā ca pitāmahāśca ihaiva vāṇijyamakārṣuḥ |
divy35:370: sa kathayati—kārṣāpaṇān mamānuprayaccha, yairihaiva vāṇijyaṁ kariṣyāmi |
divy35:371: mātā kathayati—kuto mama kārṣāpaṇāh? tvaṁ mayā kathaṁcit jñātibalena svahastabakena āyāpitaḥ poṣitaḥ saṁvardhitaḥ |
divy35:372: kuto me kārṣāpaṇānāṁ vibhavah? api tvayaṁ śroṣṭī tava pitṛvayasyo bhavati |
divy35:373: asya sakāśāt kārṣāpaṇān gṛhītvā karma kuru |
divy35:377: tasya ca gṛhāt preṣyadārikāyāḥ saṁkāratalasyopari mṛtamūṣikāṁ dṛṣṭvā prayacchati cchorayitum |
divy35:378: sa śreṣṭhī tasya puruṣasya kathayati—yaḥ puruṣaḥ syāt, śakyate anayā mṛtamūṣikayā ātmānamuddhartum |
divy35:389: tena vāṇijakena dāraka ucyate—anuprayaccha asya biḍālasya mṛtamūṣikām |
divy35:392: sa saṁlakṣayati—yadyetān bhakṣayiṣyāmi, mūlameva bbhikṣitaṁ bhaviṣyati |
divy35:393: sa tān bhrāṣṭre bharjayitvā śītalasya pānīyasya vardhanīyasya pūrṇaṁ kṛtvā tadgṛhya tasmātsthānakānniṣkramya yasmin pradeśe kāṣṭhahārakā viśrāmyanti, tasmin pradeśe gatvāvasthitaḥ |
divy35:397: tena teṣāṁ kalāyānāṁ stoktaṁ dattaṁ śītalaṁ ca pānīyaṁ pātam |
divy35:399: bhāgineya, vayaṁ tāvat kalyamevotthāya gatvā idānīmāgacchāmaḥ |
divy35:400: tvamidānīṁ gacchan kiyatā āgamiṣyasi? taistasyaikaikaṁ kāṣṭhamanupradattam |
divy35:403: sa tāṁ vikrīya kalāyānāṁ gṛhītvā bharjayitvā udakasya kumbhaṁ pūrayitvā tasminneva praveśe gatvāvasthitaḥ |
divy35:404: te kāṣṭhahārakāstathaiva tena kalāyaiḥ saṁvibhaktāḥ, śītalena pānīyena saṁtarpitāḥ |
divy35:405: te tasya kathayati—bhāgineya, divase divase tvaṁ kalāyān pānīyaṁ ca gṛhītvā āgamya atraiva tiṣṭham |
divy35:408: sa teṣāṁ kathayati—mātula, mā yūyaṁ kāṣṭhabhārān vīrthāṁ nayatha |
divy35:420: tasya tatprabhūto lābhaḥ sa saṁlakṣayati—etat pratikruṣṭataraṁ vāṇijyānām yaduta ukkarikāpaṇaḥ |
divy35:424: sa saṁlakṣayati—etadapi pratikraṣṭataraṁ ca tadvāṇijyānāṁ pūrvavat |
divy35:426: tasya mūṣikāhairaṇyako mūṣikāhairaṇyaka iti saṁjñā saṁvṛttā |
divy35:427: te hairaṇyakāḥ kathayanti—bhavantaḥ, sarve vayamanena mūṣikāhairaṇyakenābhibhūtāḥ |
divy35:428: vayamenaṁ mānaṁ prāhayāmaḥ, yathā mahāsamudramavataret tatraivānayena vyasanamāpatsyate tathā kariṣyāma iti |
divy35:429: te tasya nātidūre sthitvā svaiḥ kathāsamlāpena tiṣṭhanti—yathāpi nāma bhavantaḥ puruṣo hastigrīvāyāṁ gatvā aśvapṛṣṭhena gacchet, aśvapṛṭhena gatvā śibikāyāṁ gacchet, śibikāyāṁ gatvā padbhyāṁ gacchet, evamevāsya mūṣkikāhairaṇyikasya pitā ca pitāmahāśca samudre potasaṁvyavahātiṇa āsan |
divy35:430: eṣa idānīṁ kuṛcchreṇa jīvikāṁ kalpayati hairaṇyikāpaṇaṁ vāhayatīti |
divy35:431: śrutvā sa kathayati—kiṁ kathayata? te kathayanti—tava pitā ca pitāmahāśca potasaṁvyavahāriṇa āsan |
divy35:432: sa tvamidānīṁ kṛcchreṇa jīvikāṁ kalpayasi, hairaṇyikāpaṇaṁ vāhayasi? sa gṛhaṁ gatvā mātaraṁ pṛcchati—amba, satyamasmākaṁ pitā ca pitāmahāśca mahāsamudre petasaṁvyavahāriṇa āsan? sā saṁlakṣayati—nūnamanena kiṁcitkutaścit śrutaṁ syāt |
divy35:439: tena ghaṇṭāvadhoṣaṇaṁ kṛtam—yo yuṣmākamutsahate mūṣikāhairaṇyena sārdhamaśulkenāgulmenātarapaṇyena mahāsamudramavataritum, sa mahāsamudragamanīyaṁ paṇyaṁ samudānayatu |
divy35:441: atha mūṣilāhairaṇyikaḥ kṛtamaṅgalakaitūhalasvastyayanaḥ śakaṭairbhārairmūṭaiḥ piṭakairuṣṭrairgobhirgardabhaiḥ paṇyamāropya mahāsamudraṁ saṁprasthitaḥ |
divy35:445: sārthavāhaḥ karṇadhārasya kathayati—kathaya kathaya bhoḥ puruṣa yathābhūtaṁ mahāsamudrasya varṇam |
divy35:446: 437.032ṭataḥ karṇadhāra uddhoṣayitumārabdhah—santyetasmin mahāsamudre imānyevamrūpāṇi ratnāni tadyathā—maṇayo muktā vaiḍūryaśaṅkhaśilāpravāla rajatajātarūpamaśmagarbho musāragalvo lohitakā dakṣiṇāvartaḥ |
divy35:447: yo yuṣmākamutsahate evamrūpai ratnairātmānaṁ samyaksukhena pratiṇayitum, mātāpitarau putradārān dāsīdāsakarmakarapauruṣeyaṁ motrāmātyajñātisālohitaṁ kālena kālaṁ śramaṇabrāhmaṇebhyo dakṣiṇāṁ pratiṣṭhāpayitum, mūrdhagāminīṁ saubhāsikīṁ sukhavipākāmāyatyāṁ svargasaṁvartanīm, sa mahāsamudramavataratu |
divy35:450: sārthavāhaḥ saṁlakṣayati—kimidānīṁ vakṣyāmi avatarateti? sa karṇadhārasya kathayati—ghoṣaya bhoḥ puruṣa mahāsamudrasya yathābhūtaṁ varṇam |
divy35:451: tataḥ karṇadhāra uddhoṣitumāravdhah—śṛṇvantu bhavanto jambudvīpakā vaṇijaḥ |
divy35:452: santyasmin mahāsamudre imānyevaṁtūpāṇi mahānti mahābhayāni, tadyadhā timibhayaṁ timiṁgalabhayaṁ timitimiṁgalabhayamāvartabhayaṁ kumbhīrabhayaṁ śiśumārabhayamantarjalagatānāṁ parvatānāmāghātabhayam |
divy35:453: caurā apyatrāgavvhanti nīlaiḥ sitairvanacāriṇaḥ, asmākaṁ sarveṇa sarvaṁ jīvitādvyavaropayiṣyanti |
divy35:454: yena yuṣmākaṁ priyamātmānaṁ parityaktvā mātāpitarau putradāraṁ dāsīdāsakarmakarapauruṣeyaṁ mitrāmātyañjātisālohitaṁ mahāsamudramavataratu |
divy35:457: tataḥ karṇadhārastriruddḥpṣaṇāvaghoṣaṇaṁ kṛtvā tataḥ paścādekāṁ vastrāṁ muñcati, dvitrivastrāṁ muñjati, yatastadvahanaṁ mahākarṇadhārasaṁdhānabalavadvāyusampreritaṁ mahāmegha iva saṁprasthito ’nuguṇena vāyunā yāvad ratnadvīpamanuprāptam |
divy35:458: tataḥ karṇadhāra uddhoṣayitumārabdhah—śṛṇvantu bhavanto jambudvīpakā vaṇijaḥ, santyasmin ratnadvīpe kācamaṇayo ratnasadṛśāḥ |
divy35:461: asminneva ca ratnadvīpe kroñjakumārikā nāma rākṣasyaḥ prativasanti |
divy35:462: tāḥ puruṣaṁ tathā upalālayanti yathā tatraivānayena vyasanamāpadyante |
divy35:464: tāni yaḥ paribhuṅkte, sa saptarātraṁ mūrcchitastiṣṭhati |
divy35:468: saptāahasyātyayāt tādṛśaṁ vāyumutsṛjanti yena vahanamapahriyate yathāpi tadkṛtakāryāṇām |
divy35:469: yaṁ śrutvā te vaṇijo ’vahitā apramattā avasthitāḥ |
divy35:474: sa kathayati—agradhanikaṁ tāvacchinadbhi, tataḥ paścānniveśaṁ kariṣyāmi |
divy35:475: sa tathā uktah—putra na tava putā na putāmaho dhanikaḥ kṛtaḥ, kutastava dhaniko jātah? sa kathayati—amba, ahameva jānāmi |
divy35:477: tena suvarṇasya phelāṁ pūrayitvā catasno mūṣikāścaturṣu pārśveṣu sthāpayitvā śroṣṭhigṛhaṁ gataḥ |
divy35:478: sa śreṣṭhī tadā tasyaiva tadvarṇaṁ bhāṣamāṇastiṣṭhati—paśyata bhavanto mūṣikāhairaṇyikaḥ kathaṁ puṇyamaheśākhyo yam yameva gṛhṇāti tṛṇaṁ vā loṣṭaṁ vā sarvaṁ tat suvarṇaṁ saṁpadyate |
divy35:482: sa praviśya kathayati—idaṁ te mūlam, ayaṁ lābhaḥ |
divy35:491: tava pitrā gacchatā mama hasto kārṣāpaṇāḥ sthāpitāḥ |
divy35:492: tena śreṣṭhinā duhitā sarvlamlāravibhūṣitā tasya bhāryārthamanupradattā |
divy35:494: kiṁ manyadhve bhikṣavo yo ’sau śreṣṭhī, ahameva tena kālena tena samayena |
divy35:495: yo ’sau mūṣikāhairaṇyakaḥ, eṣa eva panthakastena kālena tena samayena |
divy35:497: etarhyapyeṣa mayā parittenāvavādenāvavādya saṁsārakāntārāduttārya atyantaniṣṭhe ’nuttare yogakṣeme nirvāṇe pratiṣṭhāpitāḥ |
divy35:499: bhikṣavo buddhaṁ bhagavantaṁ pṛcchanti—kiṁ bhadanta panthakena karma kṛtam yasya karmaṇo vipākena dhanvaḥ paramadhanvaścūḍaḥ paramacūḍo jātah? panthakenaiva bhikṣavaḥ karmāṇi kṛtāni |
divy35:500: na bhikṣavaḥ karmāṇi kṛtānyupacitāni bāhye vipacyante, nābdhātau, na tejodhātau, na vāyudhātau, api tūpātteṣveva skandhadhātvāyataneṣu vipacyante śubhānyaśubhāni ca |
divy35:502: sāmagrīṁ prāpya kālaṁ ca phalanti khalu dehinām (7)|
divy35:503: bhūtapūrvaṁ bhikṣavo viṁśativarṣasahasrāyuṣi prajāyāṁ kāśyapo nāma śastā loka utpannastathāgato ’rhan samyaksambuddho vidyāciraṇasampannaḥ sugato lokavidanuttaraḥ puruṣadamyasārathiḥ śāstā devānāṁ ca manuṣyāṇāṁ ca buddho bhagavān |
divy35:504: sa viṁśatibhirbhikṣusahasraiḥ parivāro vārāṇasīmupaniśritya viharati sma |
divy35:506: anena tatra mātsaryeṇa na kasyaciccatuṣpadikāpi gāthā uddiṣṭo |
divy35:510: sa saṁlakṣayati—yadi sūkarān praghātya nayiṣyāmi, māṁsasya krayiko na bhaviṣyati, kledaṁ gamiṣyati |
divy35:512: tatra tatra praghātya neṣyāmi, yatra yatra krāyiko ’sti |
divy35:513: sa prabhūtān sūkarāñ jānuṣu buddhvā nāvamāropya saṁprasthitaḥ |
divy35:520: sa saṁlakṣayati—kiṁ tāvadayaṁ mṛtah āhosvijjīvatīti? paśyati yāvajjīvati |
divy35:521: sa tena gajamujasadṛśaṁ bāhumabhiprasārya uddhṛtya vālukāyāḥ shalaṁ kṛtvā tatrāvamūrdhakaḥ sthāpitāḥ |
divy35:525: sa tena pādānusāreṇa gato yāvatpaśyati pañcamātrāṇi pratyekabuddhaśatāni |
divy35:526: sa teṣāṁ patreṇa puṣpeṇa phalena dantakāṣṭhena copasthānaṁ kartumārabdhaḥ |
divy35:529: atha te pratyekabuddhāḥ paryaṅka buddhvā dhyāyanti |
divy35:530: tadā so ’pyekānte sthitvā paryaṅkaṁ buddhcā dhyāyati |
divy35:534: yo ’sau kāśyapasya samyaksambuddhasya pravacane bhikṣastripiṭah āsīt, paścādasau saukarikaḥ, eṣa eva panthako bhikṣuḥ |
divy35:535: yadanena mātsaryeṇa na kasyaciccatuṣpadikā gāthā uddiṣṭā, yacca sūkarān praghātya yaccāsaṁjñisattvebhya ihopapannaḥ, tasya karmaṇo vipākena cūḍaḥ paramacūḍo dhanvaḥ paramadhanvaḥ saṁvṛttaḥ |
divy35:537: yadā āyuṣmān panthakaḥ svākhyāte dharmavinaye pravrajitaḥ, jīvakena śrutam—panthakaḥ svākhyāte dharmavinaye pravrajita iti |
divy35:538: sa saṁlakṣayati—yadi bhagavān rājagṛhamāgamiṣyati, ahaṁ buddhapramukhaṁ bhikṣusaṁghaṁ bhojayiṣyāmi sthāpayitvā bhadantaṁ panthakam |
divy35:539: bhagavān yathābhiramyaṁ śrāvastīṁ vihṛtya yena rājagṛhe tena cārikāṁ prakrāntaḥ |
divy35:542: aśrauṣījjīvakaḥ kumārabhūtah—bhagavān magadheṣu janapadacārikāṁ caran rājagṛhe viharati veṇuvane kalandakanivāpe |
divy35:544: apasaṁkramya bhagavataḥ pādau śirasā vanditvaikānto niṣaṇṇaḥ |
divy35:545: ekāntaniṣaṇṇaṁ jīvakaṁ kumārabhūtaṁ bhagavān dharmyayā kathayā saṁdarśayati samādāpayati samuttejayati saṁpraharṣayati |
divy35:546: anekaparyāyeṇa dharmyayā kathayā saṁdarśya samādāpya samuttejya saṁpraharṣya tūṣṇīm |
divy35:547: atha jīvakaḥ kumārabhūtah utthāyāsanādekāṁsamuttarāsaṅgaṁ kṛtvā yena bhagavāṁstenāñjaliṁ praṇamya bhagavantametadvocat—adhivāsayatu me bhagavāñchvo ’ntargṛhe bhaktena sārdhaṁ bhikṣusaṁghena |
divy35:549: sa na śaknoti bhagavantaṁ vaktuṁ sthāpayitvā bhadantaṁ panthakam |
divy35:550: atha jīvakaḥ kumārabhūto bhagavato bhāṣitamabhinandyānumodya bhagavato ’ntikāt prakrānto yenāyuṣmānāndastenopasaṁkrāntaḥ |
divy35:551: upasaṁkramyāyuṣmata ānandasya pādau śirasā vinditvā ekānte niṣaṇṇaḥ |
divy35:552: ekāntaniṣaṇṇo jīvakaḥ kumārabhūta āyucmantamānandimadamavocat—yatkhalu bhadanta ānanda jānīyāh—mayā buddhapramukho bhikṣusaṁghaḥ śvo ’ntargehe bhaktenopanimantritaḥ sthāpayitvā bhadantaṁ panthakam |
divy35:553: yathā te jīvaka kuśalānāṁ dharmāṇāṁ vṛddhirbhavati |
divy35:554: atha jīvakaḥ kumārabhūta āyuṣmata ānandasya bhāṣitamabhinandyānumodya āyuṣmata ānandasya pādau śirasā vanditvā prakrāntaḥ |
divy35:555: athāyuṣmānānando ’ciraprakrāntaṁ jīvakaṁ kumārabhūtaṁ viditvā yenāyuṣmān pathakastenopasaṁkrāntaḥ |
divy35:556: upasaṁkramyāyuṣmantaṁ panthakamidamavocat—yatkhalvāyuṣman panthaka jānīyāh—jīvakena kumārabhūtena buddhapramukho bhikṣusaṁghaḥ śvo ’ntargṛhe bhaktenopapanimantritaḥ shāpyitvā āyuṣmantaṁ panthakam |
divy35:558: sa jīvakaḥ kumārabhūtastāmeva rātriṁ śuciṁ praṇītaṁ khādanīyaṁ bhojanīyaṁ samudānīya kalyamevotthāya āsanāni prajñapya udakamaṇīn pratiṣṭhāpya bhagavato dūtena kālamārocayati—samaye bhadanta, sajjaṁ bhaktam yasyedānīṁ bhagavān kālaṁ manyate |
divy35:559: atha bhagavān pūrvāhṇe nivāsya pātracīvaramādāya bhikṣugaṇaparivṛto bhikṣusaṁghapuraskṛto yena jīvakasya kumārabhūtasya niveśanaṁ tenopasaṁkrāntaḥ |
divy35:562: jīvakaḥ kumārabhūtaḥ sauvarṇabhṛṅgāraṁ gṛhītvā vṛddhānte tiṣṭhati |
divy35:564: jīvikaḥ kumārabhūtaḥ kathayati—kiṁ kāraṇaṁ bhagavan vāridhārāṁ na pratigṛhṇāti |
divy35:568: jīvakaḥ kathayati—bhagavan, nāsau mayā nimantrita iti |
divy35:569: bhagavānāha—na tvayā jīvaka buddhapramukho bhikṣusaṁgho nimantritah? bhagavan, nimantritaḥ |
divy35:570: kimasau bhikṣusaṁghādbahir na vā? bhagavān kathayati jīvakam—gaccha tvaṁ śabdāpaya |
divy35:571: jīvakaḥ kumārabhūtaḥ saṁlakṣayati—kiṁ cāpyahaṁ bhagavato gauraveṇa śabdāpayāmi, na satkṛtya pariveṣayiṣyāmi |
divy35:574: tena dūtena gatvā panthaka iti śabdo muktaḥ |
divy35:576: sa dūta āgatya jīvakasya kathayati—tathaiva veṇuvanaṁ kalandakanivāpo bhikṣūṇāṁ pūrṇastiṣṭhati |
divy35:577: bhagavānāha—gaccha tvaṁ kathaya yo bhūtapanthakaḥ sa āgacchatu |
divy35:578: sa gatvā kathayati—yo bhūtapanthakaḥ sa āgacchatu |
divy35:579: āyuṣmān panthakastatra gatvā svasyāṁ gatyāṁ niṣaṇṇāḥ |
divy35:582: bhagavān saṁlakṣayati—sumeruprakhye mahāśrāvake jīvakaḥ kumārabhūtaḥ kṣāntiṁ gṛhṇāti |
divy35:585: dharmatā khalu na tāvat sthabirashtavirāṇāṁ bhikṣūṇāṁ pātrāṇi pratigṛhyante, yāvadbhagavataḥ pātrapratigrahī na bhaviṣyati |
divy35:586: āyuṣmān panthakaḥ saṁlakṣayati—kiṁ kāraṇaṁ bhagavataḥ sthavirasthavirāṇāṁ bhikṣūṇāṁ pātrāṇi na gṛhyante? mayā atra guṇodbhāvanā kartavyā |
divy35:587: āyuṣmatā panthakenādharmāsanaṁ kṛtvā gajabhujasadṛśaṁ bāhumabhiprasārya bhagavataḥ pātraṁ gṛhītam |
divy35:593: sa jalapariṣekapratyāgataprāṇa āyuṣmataḥ panthakasya pādayor nipatya kṣamāpayati, gāthāṁ ca bhāṣate— nityaṁ caityaguṇo hi candanaraso nityaṁ sugandhayutpalaṁ nityaṁ bhāsati kāñcanasya vimalaṁ vaiḍūryaśuddham |
divy35:594: nityaṁ pāpajane hi krodhamatulaṁ pāṣāṇarekhopamaṁ nityaṁ cāryajaneṣu prātirvasate kṣāntirdhruvā hyarhatām (8)|
divy35:597: bhikṣavo buddhaṁ bhagavantaṁ pṛcchanti—paśya bhadanta, yadā jīvakaḥ kumārabhūta āyuṣmataḥ panthakasya guṇānāmanabhijñastadā asatkāraḥ prayuktaḥ, yadā guṇānāmabhijñastadā pādayor nipatya kṣamāpayati |
divy35:598: bhagavānāh—na bhikṣava etarhi yathātīte ’dhvanyeṣo ’sya guṇānāmanabhijñah,tadā asatkāraṁ prayuktavān |
divy35:602: bhūtapūrvaṁ bhikṣava uttarāpathāt sārthavāḥ pañcaśatamaśvapaṇyamādāya madhyadeśamāgataḥ |
divy35:604: sa yameva divasamavakrāntastameva divasamupādāya te ’śvā na bhūyo heṣante |
divy35:605: sārthavahaḥ saṁlakṣayati—kiṁ ca mamāśvānāṁ kaścid rogaḥ prādurbhūto bhaviṣyati yena te na heṣante? apareṇa samayenāśvā vaḍavā prasūtā |
divy35:607: sa yameva divasamupādāya te ’śvāḥ saṁcartumapi nārabdhāḥ |
divy35:608: sārthavāhaḥ saṁlakṣayati—nūnamayaṁ daurbhāgyasattvo jātah asya doṣaṇa mamāśvānāṁ rogaḥ prādurbhūtaḥ |
divy35:613: sa saṁlakṣayati—yadi gamiṣyāmi, aśvānāṁ khurāḥ kledaṁ gamiṣyanti, apaṇyoobhaviṣyanti |
divy35:615: sa tasyaiva varṣāmuṣitasya tadvāsino yo śilpinaste svena śilpenopasthānaṁ kurvānti |
divy35:624: sa tasya kathayati—bhoḥ puruṣa, aticireṇa tvamāgataḥ |
divy35:628: sa kathayati—api tvayamekaḥ kiśorastiṣṭhati, yadi prayo ’si, gṛhītvā gaccha |
divy35:634: sa patnyā uktah—asti kiṁcittvayā tasya sakāśāllabdham? labdham |
divy35:639: sa pakkamānānāṁ bhāṇḍānāṁ madhye parisarpanna kiṁcidbhāṇḍaṁ bhinatti |
divy35:648: tena kumbhakāreṇa patnī uktā—bhadre, śobhanaḥ kiśorakaḥ |
divy35:649: na bhūyo mayā mṛttikā voḍhavyā bhaviṣyati |
divy35:653: tena kālena tena samayena vārāṇasyāṁ brahmadatto nāma rājā rājyaṁ kārayati ṛddhaṁ ca sphītaṁ ca bahujanamanuṣyaṁ ca |
divy35:656: taistasya saṁdiṣṭam—karapratyāyān vā anuprayaccha udyānam vā |
divy35:658: sa teṣāṁ karapratyāyān nānuprayacchati, nāpi taṁ sa udyānaṁ samāgataḥ |
divy35:660: brahmadattena rājñā śrutam—uttarāpathāt sārthavāho ’śvapaṇyamādāya vārāṇasīmanuprāpta iti |
divy35:661: so ’mātyānāmantrayate sma—bhavantaḥ, kiyacciraṁ mayehaṁ praviṣṭena sthātavyam? gacchata, aśvājāneyaṁ paryeṣadhvam |
divy35:665: sārthavāhaṁ dṛṣṭvā te kathayanti—bhavanto ’śvāvaḍavāyā aśvājāneyo jātaḥ |
divy35:667: sārthavāhamupasaṁkramya pṛcchanti—asti kaścidaśvastvayā vikrītaḥ kasyacidvā datta iti? sa kathayati—nāsti kaścidvikrītaḥ |
divy35:668: api tvasti mayā pūjitake ’dhiṣṭhāne ’maṅgalakaḥ kiśorakaḥ kumbhakārasya datta iti |
divy35:669: te ’nyonyaṁ kathayanti—bhavantaḥ, mahāmūrkho ’yaṁ sārthavāhaḥ, yo ’yaṁ maṅgalamapahāyāmaṅgalānevādāyāgata iti |
divy35:672: upasaṁkramya kathayanti—kimanena kiśorakena karoṣi? sa āha—eṣa mama mṛttikāṁ vahati |
divy35:673: te kathayati—vayaṁ te tathā gardabhamanuprayacchāmaḥ, tvamasmākamamumanuprayacchasva |
divy35:677: te kathayanti—evaṁ cet saṁpradhāraya vayaṁ śvo bhūya āgamiṣyāmaḥ |
divy35:679: sa kiśorakaḥ kathayati—kimarthaṁ nānuprayacchasi? kiṁ tvaṁ jānāsi mayā mṛttikā voḍhavyā tuṣāśca kuṭisakaṇṭaṁ bhakṣitavyam |
divy35:680: mayā rājā kṣatriyo mūrdhābhiṣikto vāḍhavyaḥ, sauvarṇasthāle madhumrākṣitakā mūlakā bhakṣitavyāḥ |
divy35:681: te yadi saṁkathayanti keśoraka iti, vaktavyāh—kiṁ lajjadhvaṁ vaktumaśvājāneya iti? śvaḥ punarāgatvā te kathayiṣyanti mūlyenānuprayaccheti |
divy35:682: vaktavyāh—suvarṇalakṣaṁ vānuprayacchatha yāvadvā dakṣiṇena sakthnā kariṣyati tāvadanuprayacchati |
divy35:683: te ’parasmin divase upasaṁkramya pṛcchanti—bhoḥ puruṣa, saṁpradhāritaṁ tvayā? saṁpradhāritam—kiṁ lajjadhvaṁ vaktumaśvājāneya iti? te kathayanti—mūrkhaḥ sa eṣaḥ |
divy35:688: sa kathayati—suvarṇalakṣaṁ vānuprayaccḥ, yāvadvā suvarṇalakṣaṁ dakṣiṇena sakthnā kariṣyati |
divy35:692: tairbrahmadattasya rājñaḥ saṁdiṣṭaṁ suvarṇalakṣeṇa aśvājāneyo labhyate |
divy35:693: rājñāpi saṁdiṣṭam—yūyam yāvatā mūlyena tāvatā gṛhṇīta |
divy35:699: kiṁ sarogo bhavadbhiraśvājāneya ānītah? api tu samanuyuñjyāmahe tāvadenam |
divy35:700: atha sūto gāthāṁ bhāṣate— smarasi turaga ghaṭikarasya śālāṁ kimiha vidhairya viprayukraḥ |
divy35:702: na carasi bahumatastadarthe māsidiha hi cara yānasahasrapūrṇayāyī |
divy35:703: hyavasanamidaṁ tṛṣāpanītaṁ na carasi kiṁ vada me ’dya sādhu pṛṣṭaḥ (10)|
divy35:706: tvamiha vidhihitapradābhimānī na ca vihito bhavato yathāvadasmi |
divy35:707: nidhanamahamiha prayāyamāśu na ca biduṣāya taraya pūrvyām (12)|
divy35:708: suciramapi hi na sajjanāvamāno yadi guṇavānasi saumya nāvamānaḥ |
divy35:709: kṣaṇamāpi khalu sajjanāvamāno yadi guṇavānasi nāvamānaḥ (13)|
divy35:710: sūto rājñaḥ kathayati—devasyānupūrvī na kṛtā yanaiṣa yavasayogyāśanaṁ na gṛhṇāti |
divy35:716: sa tasya śataśalākaṁ chatraṁ mūrdhni dhārayati |
divy35:717: rājño jyeṣṭhā duhitā sauvarṇena maṇivyajanena makṣikān vārayati |
divy35:718: rājño ’gramahiṣī sauvargasthāle madhumrakṣitakān mūlān bhakṣayato dhārayati |
divy35:720: rājā kathayati—eṣa nāma rājā, nāhaṁ sa rājeti |
divy35:721: sūtaḥ kathayati—deva, nāsya sarvakālameṣa upacāraḥ kriyate |
divy35:723: rājā kathayati—yattāvadatītaṁ na śakyaṁ tatpunaḥ kartum, yadavaśiṣṭaṁ tatkriyatām |
divy35:724: yasmin pradeśe tāmrapaḍḍairbaddhaḥ, tasya rājño jyeṣṭhaḥ putraḥ śataśalākāṁ dhārayati, rājño jyeṣṭhā duhitā sauvarṇamaṇimayavālavyajanena makṣikān vārayati, rājño ’gramāhiṣī sauvarṇena sthālena madhumrakṣitakān mūlān bhakṣayato dhārayati, rājño ’mātyaḥ sauvarṇena lakṣaṇena laḍḍīśchorayati |
divy35:726: sasṛtaparamasugandhivilepanānudhārī madhuramadhurakṛtāntarānurāgā nṛpamahiṣī turagottamāya dattā rājñā |
divy35:728: rājā sūtaṁ pṛcchati—rājā asya pṛṣṭhaṁ duḥkhayati |
divy35:733: rājā sūtaṁ pṛcchati—eṣo bibheti? deva, naiṣa bibheti |
divy35:734: api tu mā rājānaṁ pucchodakena sekṣyāmīti |
divy35:738: sāmantarājaiḥ śrutam—yathā rājā brahmadatta udyānaṁ gata iti |
divy35:740: rājñā brahmadattena śrutaṁ sāmantarājair nagaradvārāṇi nigṛhītānīti |
divy35:742: antarā ca vārāṇasyantarā codyānamatrāntarā brahmavatī nāma puṣkiriṇyutpalakuṁdapuṇḍarīkasaṁchannā |
divy35:744: rājā tuṣṭo ’matyānāṁ kathayati—bhavantaḥ, yorājñaḥ kṣatriyasya mūrdhnābhiṣiktasya jīvitamanuprayacchati, kiṁ tasya kartavyam? deva, upārdharājyaṁ dātavyam |
divy35:746: kimasyopārdharājyena? api tvenamāgamya saptāhaṁ dānāni dīyantām, puṇyāni kriyantām, akālakaumudī ca kriyatām |
divy35:747: amātyaiḥ saptāahaṁ dānāni dātumārabdhāni, puṇyāni kartumārabdhāni, saptāhamakālakaumudī prasthāpitā |
divy35:748: sārthavāhaḥ puruṣān pṛcchati—bhavantaḥ, kimakālakaumudī vartate? te ’sya kathayanti—pūjitaṁ nāmādhiṣṭhānam |
divy35:749: tataḥ kumbhakārasya sakāśāt suvarṇalakṣeṇāśvājāneyaṁ gṛhītvā ihānītam |
divy35:751: tamāgamya saptāhaṁ dānāni dātumārabdhāni, puṇyāni kriyante, akālakaumudī ca prasthāpitā |
divy35:752: sārthavāhaḥ saṁlakṣayati—yo mayā chorito nāma, sa eṣa kiśorako ’śvājāneyaḥ syāt? tattāvadgatvā paśyāmi |
divy35:754: sa tenāśvājāneyenoktah—bhoḥ puruṣa, kiṁ tvayā teṣāmaśvānāṁ sakāśāllabdham? mayaikākinaiva tasya kumbhakārasya suvarṇalakṣaṁ dattam |
divy35:758: kiṁ manyadhve bḥkṣavo yo ’sau sārthavāhaḥ, eṣa eva jīvakastena kālena tena samayena |
divy35:759: yo ’śvājāneyaḥ, eṣa eva panthakastena kālena tena samayena |
divy35:760: tadāpi yadā asyaiṣa guṇānāmanabhijñaḥ, tadāsyāsatkāraṁ prayuktavān |
divy35:761: yadā tu guṇānāmabhijñaḥ, tadā pādayor nipatya kṣamāpitavān |
divy35:762: etarhyapyeṣa yadā guṇānāmanabhijñaḥ, tadā asatkāraṁ prayuktavān |
divy35:763: yadā guṇānāmabhijñaḥ, tadā pādayor nipatya kṣamapayati |
